entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Leamington
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:20 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Harrow AAFC 1:00 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
Temperature: 2.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 80 %
Dewpoint: -0.9°C
Wind: ENE 22 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Rain mixed with snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain or snow at times heavy beginning this afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm except snowfall amount 5 cm over northern sections. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 late this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain or snow at times heavy changing to snow at times heavy overnight. Local blowing snow. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm except snowfall amount 5 cm over northern sections. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 early in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
